Definition at line 155 of file rsautility.php.

RsaUtility::decrypt ( $  data,
$  senderPubKey = null,
$  checkSignature = false 
)

decrypts asymetric crypted data first base64-decodes it, then decrypts it and finally unserializes it best used to decrypt data encrypted with encryptAsymetric()

Parameters:
string $data: the encrypted data
mixed $senderPubKey: the public key of the sender, needed for signature check (defaults to null)
bool $checkSignature: true if signature should be checked (defaults to false)
Returns:
mixed: the decrypted data, false on error

RsaUtility::encrypt ( $  data,
$  receiverPubKey,
$  sign = false 
)

encrypts data asymetrically

first serializes the data, then encrypts it and finally base64-encodes it best used to crypt data which can be decrypted with decryptAsymetric()

Parameters:
mixed $data: the data to encrypt
mixed $receiverPubKey: the public key of the receiver
mixed $ownPrivKey: own private key, needed if data should also be signed (defaults to null)
bool $sign: true if signature should be added (defaults to false)
Returns:
mixed: the encrypted data, false on error
